no-queued-posts: There are no posts in the post queue.
no-single-post: The topic or post you are looking for is no longer in the queue. It has likely been approved or deleted already.
enabling-help: The post queue is currently disabled. To enable this feature, go to Settings → Post → Post Queue and enable Post Queue.
public-intro: If you have any queued posts, they will be shown here.
public-description:
This forum is configured to automatically queue posts from new accounts, pending moderator approval.
If you have queued posts awaiting approval, you will be able to see them here.
title: Titulli
content-editable: Klikoni mbi përmbajtjen për ta modifikuar
category-editable: Klikoni në kategori për ta modifikuar
title-editable: Klikoni mbi titullin për të modifikuar
confirm-reject: Jeni i sigurt që dëshironi ta anulloni këtë postim?
confirm-remove: Do you want to remove this post?
reject-all-confirm: Dëshiron të refuzosh të gjitha postimet?
reject-selected-confirm: Dëshiron të refuzosh %1 postimet e selektuara?
remove-all-confirm: Do you want to remove all posts?
remove-selected-confirm: Do you want to remove %1 selected posts?
